name: Desert Fury (itch)
description:
Desert Fury is an open world environmental puzzle game. It is very hard and not for anyone who isnt a hard core gamer. My cousin has played every cup head game and even he hasnt solved the last puzzle.

 all controls and story are established in the game. A blind playthrough is recommended. Just be prepared for a mind blowing ending.

Desert Fury has limitless gameplay with an amazing open world map to get lost in. If you cant play this game because you have a mac computer, or the other one, just let me know, so that I can port it because everyone should play this game.

If you would like to download the official Desert Fury original soundtrack, you can give me a call.
